title: Story 3.3A: Define Weapon Acquisition System
description: Define and document how players acquire weapons. Choose between random floor spawns, loadout system, or fixed spawn points. Document in GDD.
close_reason: Migrated as done from ReadyQ - weapon acquisition system defined

title: Story 3.0B: Fix Pistol Damage Mismatch
description: Fix pistol damage mismatch between client (15) and server (25). Change client constant to match server.
close_reason: Migrated as done from ReadyQ - pistol damage fixed

title: Story 3.6: Implement Dodge Roll with Invincibility Frames
description: Dodge roll with Space. 0.4s duration, 100px distance. First 0.2s invincible. 3s cooldown. Cannot shoot/reload during roll.

title: Story 3.8: Implement Shared Configuration System for Weapon Stats
description: Single source of truth for weapon stats. JSON config loaded by both client and server. CI validates configs match.

title: Story 3.0: Weapon Balance Research & Validation
description: Validate weapon balance across all 5 weapons before implementation. Create DPS calculations, TTK analysis, and risk/reward trade-off matrix. See docs/weapon-balance-analysis.md.
close_reason: Migrated as done from ReadyQ - weapon balance research complete

title: Tech Debt: Research and fix chatty integration test logs
description: Integration tests produce verbose output overwhelming agent context windows. Investigate sources and reduce log verbosity.

title: Story 3.4: Implement Manual Reload Mechanic
description: Manual reload with R key. Weapon-specific reload times. Progress bar, auto-reload on empty, can cancel by switching weapons. Can move during reload.

title: Story 3.3: Implement Ranged Weapons (Uzi, AK47, Shotgun)
description: Implement ranged weapons. Uzi: 8 dmg, 10 rps, 600px range. AK47: 20 dmg, 6 rps, 800px range. Shotgun: 60 dmg spread. Recoil and spread mechanics.

title: Story 3.4A: Define Ammo Economy & Magazine Balance
description: Define ammo economy system. Document magazine sizes, reload times, and ammo scarcity decisions. Update GDD Section 2.3.
close_reason: Migrated as done from ReadyQ - ammo economy defined

title: Story 3.2: Implement Melee Weapons (Bat and Katana)
description: Implement melee combat. Bat: 25 dmg, 0.5s cooldown, 64px range. Katana: 45 dmg, 0.8s cooldown, 80px range. Knockback, sound effects, screen shake.

title: Story 3.7B: Health Bars & Hit Effects
description: Health bar UI (32x4, green bar), bullet impact flash, melee hit lines, muzzle flash. Visual feedback during combat.

title: Story 3.5: Implement Sprint Mechanic
description: Sprint with Shift key. 1.5x speed (200->300 px/s), accuracy penalty (+50% spread), louder footsteps. No stamina limit.

title: Story 3.1: Implement Weapon Pickup System
description: Implement weapon pickup from map spawns. Player moves within 32px, press E to pick up, server validates and broadcasts. Weapons respawn after 30s.
close_reason: Migrated as done from ReadyQ - weapon pickup system implemented

title: Story 3.7A: Character & Weapon Sprites
description: Create stick figure sprites (16x32), 4-frame walk animation. All 5 weapon sprites with distinct designs. Color customization.
